name: balance game
description:
balance game, a quickly thrown together prototype for Curdle Jam 8. Dodge the projectiles by leaning left/right or jumping. Be careful to not lose your balance, though...

Controls
Left and Right arrows - change balance
Z - jump
P - pause game
F3 - reset game

Credits

  • Game by freem, made with LÖVE
  • Sounds generated with jsfxr

Libraries used:

  • baton by tesselode
  • tick by bjornbytes
  • lume by rxi
